title: Nanny-cam video captures a toddler saying goodnight to his pet cat
text:
A toddler has been captured on nanny-camera engaged in an adorable exchange with his beloved pet cat.

The footage was filmed last month in Pickerington, Ohio before it was shared online by the 18-month-old boy's parents.

In the clip, which has now gone viral, the tot is seen sitting in his crib before the kitty pushes through the door to say hello.

The cat captures the interest of the curious toddler after it brushes up to the side of the bassinet and meows.

'Meow,' the baby says back, before the kitty jumps up on a nearby feeding chair to continue to conversation.

The toddler then stands up on his feet and leans across the railings of the crib to come face-to-face with the feline.

A toddler has been captured on nanny-camera engaged in an adorable exchange with his beloved pet cat n Pickerington, Ohio

The kitty and the tot 'meow' at each other back and forth, with their close connection becoming ever more apparent.

The youngster's parents said they had no idea the cute moment was taking place until the heard noises coming from their baby monitor.

The adorable exchange continued until the parents decided to 'remove the cat from the nursery so their son could finally go to sleep without any distraction'.

The cat captures the interest of the curious toddler after it brushes up to the side of the bassinet and meows
description: The footage was filmed last month in Pickerington, Ohio before it was shared online by the 18-month-old boy's parents.
